Blade Ward.description: Until the end of my next turn, Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing dmg resist. vs. weapons

Booming Blade.description: Melee weapon attack with cast; hit: 0d8 Thunder dmg, if it moves next round +1d8

Chill Touch.description: Spell attack for 1d8 Necrotic dmg; can't regain HP; undead dis. attacks vs. me

Control Flames.description: Nonmagical flame up to 5 cu ft; instant: expand/extinguish, 1h: brighten/dim/color/creaturete shapes

Create Bonfire.description: 5-ft cube all creature now/enter/end turn save or 1d8 Fire dmg; ignites flammable

Dancing Lights.description: 4 torch-sized lights or 1 humanoid-sized light; 10-ft rad dim light; bonus action to move 60 ft

Druidcraft.description: Small nature effect; predict weaponther, expedite small plant growth, snuff light, harmless sensory effect

Eldritch Blast.description: Spell attack beam 1d10 Force damage; beams can be combined or split

Friends.description: Adv. on Cha checks vs. 1 creature currently not hostile; when spell ends, creature knows and becomes hostile

Frostbite.description: 1 creature save or 1d6 Cold dmg and dis. on next weapon attack roll

Green-Flame Blade.description: Melee weapon attack with cast; hit: 0d8 Fire dmg, 1 creature in 5 ft 0d8+spell mod Fire dmg

Guidance.description: 1 willing creature adds 1d4 to ability check of its choice, after rolling, once during the duration

Gust.description: Med. or smaller creature save or push 5 ft; or push unattended 5 lb obj 10 ft; or harmless sensory effect

Infestation.description: 1 creature save or 1d6 Poison dmg and moved 5 ft in random direction

Light.description: 1 obj up to 10-ft cube sheds bright light 20-ft rad and dim light 20-ft; cannot have multiple instances

Lightning Lure.description: 1 creature in 15 ft save or pulled 10 ft to me; if it ends in 5 ft, 1d8 Lightning dmg

Mage Hand.description: Create spectral hand for simple tasks or carry up to 10 lb; 1 a to control; can't have multiple instances

Magic Stone.description: Imbue 3 pebbles for spell attacks, thrown 60 ft or with sling, do 1d6+spellcasting mod Bludg. dmg

Mending.description: Repair a single broken object no larger than 1 cu ft; can't restore magic to broken magic item

Message.description: 1 creature I point to hears whispered message and can reply with a whisper; nobody can overhear

Mind Sliver.description: 1 creature save or 1d6 Psychic dmg, -1d4 on 1st save before my next turn end

Minor Illusion.description: 5-ft cube illusion includes visible or audible; Int(Investigation) check vs. Spell DC; see book

Mold Earth.description: 5 cu ft earth; instant.: excavate; 1h: change to difficult or normal terrain, or change shape and color

Prestidigitation.description: Minor trick; harmless sensory effect, illusory image, snuff light, clean/soil/chill/warm/flavor etc.

Primal Savagery.description: Melee spell attack, 5 ft range, for 1d10 Acid dmg

Produce Flame.description: Flame 10 ft bright light; once 30 ft ranged spell attack for 1d8 Fire dmg

Ray of Frost.description: Spell attack for 1d8 Cold dmg and -10 ft speed until start of my next turn

Resistance.description: 1 willing creature can add 1d4 to one saving throw after rolling, once during the duration

Sacred Flame.description: 1 creature that I can see save or 1d8 Radiant dmg; no bonus for cover on save

Sapping Sting.description: 1 creature that I can see save or 1d4 Necrotic dmg and fall prone

Shape Water.description: 5 cu ft water; instant: move/change flow; 1h: simple shapes/change color or opacity/freeze

Shillelagh.description: Club/quarterstaff I hold does 1d8 Bludg. dmg and uses my spellcasting ability modifier instead of Str

Shocking Grasp.description: Spell attack, adv. if metal armor, 1d8 Lightning dmg, no rea 1 turn

Spare the Dying.description: 1 living creature with 0 current HP becomes stable

Sword Burst.description: All creature in range save or 1d6 Force damage

Thaumaturgy.description: Minor wonder; my voice booms, flames flicker, tremors in the ground, ominous sounds, etc.

Thorn Whip.description: Melee spell attack for 1d6 Piercing dmg and pull creature 10 ft towards me

Thunderclap.description: 100-ft rad audible; all creature but me in area save or 1d6 Thunder dmg

Toll the Dead.description: 1 creature save or 1d12 Necrotic dmg (d8 instead of d12 if at full HP)

True Strike.description: 1 creature against whom I gain advantage on my next attack roll

Vicious Mockery.description: 1 creature save or 1d4 Psychic dmg and dis. on next attack roll

Word of Radiance.description: Any creature within range save or 1d6 Radiant damage

Absorb Elements.description: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder resistance vs. 1 attack; first melee hit next rnd 1d61d6 dmg

Alarm (R).description: Door, window, or 20-ft cube area; audible (60 ft) or mental alarm (1 mile) if undesignated creature enters

Animal Friendship.description: 1+1 beasts Int<4 save or charmed for the duration

Armor of Agathys.description: 5+5 temp HP; as long as temp HP last any creature that hits in melee takes 5+5 Cold dmg

Arms of Hadar.description: 2d6+1d6 Necrotic dmg; save halves; on failed save no reactions until next turn

Bane.description: 3+1 creatures save or have to subtract 1d4 on every attack or save for the duration

Beast Bond.description: Telepathic link with 1 beast Int<4 while in line of sight; beast has adv. on attacks vs. creature I can see

Bless.description: 3+1 creatures can add 1d4 on every attack roll or saving throw during the duration

Burning Hands.description: All in area 3d6+1d6 Fire dmg; save halves; unattended flammable objects ignite

Catapult.description: Send 5+5 lb unattended object in 90 ft straight line; if creature hit, save or 3d8+1d8 Bludg. dmg

Cause Fear.description: 1+1 creature (not construct/undead), each max 30 ft apart, save or frightened; save end of each turn

Ceremony (R).description: Perform religious ceremony on target(s) within 10 ft throughout the casting; see book (25gp cons.)

Chaos Bolt.description: Spell attack 2d81d61d6 dmg, d8s set dmg type, see B; double on d8s: new attack vs. creature in 30 ft

Charm Person.description: 1+1 humanoids, each max 30 ft apart, save or charmed; adv. on save if me/ally is fighting it

Chromatic Orb.description: Spell attack for 3d8+1d8 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison or Thunder dmg (50gp)

Color Spray.description: 6d10+2d10 HP of creature blinded, starting with the lowest current HP creature

Command.description: 1+1 creature, each max 30 ft apart, save or follow one word command, e.g. approach, drop, flee, halt

Compelled Duel.description: 1 creature save or dis. on attacks vs. not-me and save if moving more than 30 ft away

Comp. Languages (R).description: Understand all spoken language or written language when touched; does not help vs. cyphers

Create or Destroy Water.description: Create/destroy 10+10 gal of water in open container or creaturete rain/destroy fog in 30+5-ft cu

Cure Wounds.description: 1 living creature heals 1d81d8spellcasting ability modifier HP

Detect Evil and Good.description: Know if aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, undead, and des-/consecrated area within 30 ft

Detect Magic (R).description: Know presence of magic within 30 ft; 1 a to see auras and determine school

Detect Poison/Disease (R).description: Know presence, location, and type of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 ft

Disguise Self.description: Alter appearance; Int(Investigation) check vs. spell DC to determine disguise

Dissonant Whispers.description: 1 creature 3d6+1d6 Psychic dmg and flee; save halves and no fleeing; deaf creature are immune

Divine Favor.description: My weapon attacks deal an +1d4 Radiant damage for the duration

Earth Tremor.description: All creature in range except me save or 1d6+1d6 Bludgeoning dmg and prone; loose ground is dif. ter.

Ensnaring Strike.description: Next creature hit save (Large adv.) or restrained, 1d6+1d6 Piercing dmg/rnd; Str check to escape

Entangle.description: 20-ft square save or restrained; Str check vs. Spell DC to escape; for duration area is difficult terrain

Expeditious Retreat.description: I can take Dash action now, and as a bonus action for the duration

Faerie Fire.description: 20-ft cube all obj/creature save or outlined in 10 ft dim light and attacks have adv.; see invisible creature

False Life.description: I gain 1d445 temporary hit points for the duration

Feather Fall.description: 5 creatures descent only 60 ft/rnd for duration or until landed, taking no falling damage

Find Familiar (R).description: Gain the services of a familiar; can see through its eyes; it can deliver touch spells; see B (10gp cons.)

Fog Cloud.description: 20-ft+20-ft rad fog that spreads around corners; heavily obscures; 10 mph wind disperses it

Gift of Alacrity.description: 1 willing creature can add 1d8 to its initiative rolls for the duration

Goodberry.description: Create 10 berries; 1 a to eat 1 berry: heal 1 HP, nourishment for 1 day; berries lose potency after 24h

Grease.description: 10-ft square difficult terrain; all entering, in area at casting or at end of turn save or fall prone

Guiding Bolt.description: Spell attack for 4d6+1d6 Radiant dmg and next attack against target has advantage

Hail of Thorns.description: Next ranged weapon hit, all within 5 ft of target 1d10+1d10 Piercing dmg; save halves

Healing Word.description: 1 living creature heals 1d41d4spellcasting ability modifier HP

Hellish Rebuke.description: Cast when taking dmg, creature that dealt dmg 2d10+1d10 Fire dmg; save halves

Heroism.description: 1+1 creature immune to fear, gain spellcasting ability modifier temp. HP start of each turn as spell lasts

Hex.description: 1 creature +1d6 Necrotic dmg from my attacks; dis. on chosen ability checks; SL3: conc, 8h; SL5: conc, 24h

Hunter's Mark.description: 1 creature +1d6 dmg from my weapon attacks; adv. Wis (Perception/Survival) vs. target; SL3: 8h; SL5: 24h

Ice Knife.description: Ranged attack for 1d10 Piercing dmg; hit/miss 5-ft rad on target all creature save or 2d6+1d6 Cold dmg

Identify (R).description: 1 magical item or magic-imbued creature/obj; learn properties, how to use, and spells affecting it (100gp)

Illusory Script (R).description: Write a message that only I, designated creature, and any with truesight can understand (10gp cons.)

Longstrider.description: 1+1 creature's speed increatureses by 10 ft for the duration

Mage Armor.description: 1 creature that isn't weaponring armor has AC 13 + Dex modifier for the duration; spell ends if it dons armor

Magic Missile.description: 3+1 darts hit creature(s) I can see for 1d4+1 Force dmg per dart

Magnify Gravity.description: 10-ft rad all creature 2d8+1d8 Force dmg, half spd; Save halves & no spd reduce; Str check to move obj

Prot. from Evil/Good.description: 1 creature immune fear/charm/possess by abber./celest./elem./fey/fiends/undead, they also dis. on attacks

Purify Food and Drink (R).description: 5-ft rad of food and drink is rendered free of all poison and disease

Ray of Sickness.description: Spell attack for 2d8+1d8 Poison dmg; save or also poisoned until end of my next turn

Sanctuary.description: 1 creature warded; any who want to attack/target must first make save; doesn't protect vs. area spells

Searing Smite.description: Next melee weapon hit 1d61d6 Fire dmg and target ignites: start of turn save to end or 1d6 dmg

Shield.description: If hit by attack +5 AC until start of next turn; or stop Magic Missile spell from doing any dmg to me

Shield of Faith.description: 1 creature gains +2 AC for the duration

Silent Image.description: 15-ft cube illusion includes visible; 1 a move it; Int(Investigation) check vs. spell DC; see book

Sleep.description: 20-ft rad 5d8+2d8 HP of conscious creatures fall asleep, starting with the lowest current HP creature

Snare.description: 5-ft rad trap; Investigation vs spell DC to see; save or restrained 3 ft in the air; save each rnd (5sp)

Speak with Animals (R).description: Speak verbally with and understand beasts for duration; interaction limited by intelligence of beasts

Tasha's Caustic Brew.description: 30-ft long 5-ft wide all save or 2d4+2d4 Acid dmg at start of turn; action to clean self or adjacent

Tasha's Hideous Laughter.description: 1 creature with Int>4 save or fall prone, incapacitated, can't stand; save end of each turn or if taking dmg

Tenser's Floating Disk (R).description: Create a 3 ft diameter disk that carries 500 lb and follows me if I move more than 20 ft away

Thunderous Smite.description: Next melee weapon hit +2d6 Thunder dmg and save or 10 ft push and prone; audible in 300 ft

Thunderwave.description: All creature/obj in area 2d8+1d8 Thunder dmg, pushed 10 ft away; save halves and not pushed

Unseen Servant (R).description: Create a mindless, invisible, shapeless, Medium servant for simple tasks; bonus action to mentally command it

Witch Bolt.description: Rngd spell attack 1d12+1d12 Lightn. dmg; 1 a 1d12 Lightn. dmg; ends if out of range or I do other a

Wrathful Smite.description: Next melee weapon hit +1d6 Psychic dmg and save or frightened; it can take 1 a for extra save

Zephyr Strike.description: Moving doesn't provoke opportunity attacks; once: adv. on weapon attack, +1d8 Force dmg, +30 ft spd for turn

Aganazzar's Scorcher.description: 30-ft long 5-ft wide line all creatures 3d8+1d8 Fire dmg; save halves

Aid.description: 3 creatures gain 5+5 current HP and HP max for the duration

Alter Self.description: Change appearance, gain +1 magical 1d6 natural weapons, or water breathing and swim spd

Animal Messenger (R).description: Tiny beast delivers 25 word message up to 25 miles (50 miles if flyer); +48h duration

Arcane Lock.description: Entryway locked; password or designated creature opens; +10 DC break/pick lock (25gp cons.)

Augury (R).description: Omen about specific course of action I plan to take in the next 30 min (25gp)

Barkskin.description: 1 willing creature AC cannot be reduced below 16, regardless of armor it is weaponring

Beast Sense (R).description: Use 1 willing beast's senses; I'm blinded and deafened while doing so

Blindness/Deafness.description: 1+1 creature save or blinded or deafened; extra save at end of every turn

Blur.description: Enemies have dis. on attacks vs. me; no effect against creature without vision or immune to illus.

Calm Emotions.description: 20-ft rad all humanoids save or I suppress either charm/fear effects or hostility

Cloud of Daggers.description: 5-ft cube 4d4+2d4 Slashing dmg to all that enter or start turn in area

Cordon of Arrows.description: 4+2 arrows/bolts attack first creature in 30 ft one at a time for 1d6 Piercing dmg; save halves

Crown of Madness.description: 1 humanoid save or charmed and must melee attack against creature chosen by me; extra save/rnd

Darkness.description: 15-ft rad darkness on point or object; darkvision doesn't work; only magical light of SL 3+ works in it

Darkvision.description: 1 willing creature has darkvision 60 ft for the duration

Detect Thoughts.description: 1 a read thoughts of visible Int>3 creature or detect presence of invisible within 30 ft; save for probing

Dust Devil.description: 5-ft cube; all in 5-ft 1d8+1d8 Bludg. dmg and pushed 10 ft away; save halves, no push; see book

Earthbind.description: 1 creatures save or fly speed is reduced to 0; airborne creatures safely descend at 60 ft per round

Enhance Ability.description: 1+1 creature adv. on checks with 1 stat; choosing Str, Dex, Con gives secondary benefits

Enlarge/Reduce.description: 1 creature/object save or enlarged (Str adv. +1d4 weapon dmg), reduced (Str dis. -1d4 weapon dmg)

Enthrall.description: While I speak, any creature save (adv. if fighting) or dis. on Wis(Perception) for any other than me

Find Steed.description: Gain the services of a steed; communicate with each other telepathically; share spells with it; see book

Find Traps.description: Sense presence of any trap within line of sight; not exact location, but general nature of trap

Flame Blade.description: Summon fiery blade; 1 a to make a melee spell attack for 3d6+1d6/2SL Fire dmg; 10 ft bright light

Flaming Sphere.description: 2.5-ft rad flaming sphere; bonus action move 30 ft; all within 5-ft rad 2d6+1d6 Fire dmg; save halves

Fortune's Favor.description: 1+1 creature once roll extra d20 and select which to use for attack, check, save, or attack vs. it (100gp cons.)

Gentle Repose (R).description: 1 corpse protected from decay and prevent it from becoming undead; add duration to raising dead

Gust of Wind.description: 60-ft long 10-ft wide line of wind; creature starting turn in wind save or pushed 15 ft; see book

Healing Spirit.description: 5-ft cube; any living creature I see start/enter heals 1d6+1d6 HP; 1+spell mod uses; bonus action move it 30 ft

Heat Metal.description: 1 metal obj on touch 2d8+1d8 Fire dmg; save or drop obj; if held: dis. attack/chk; bonus action reheat obj

Hold Person.description: 1+1 humanoids, within 30 ft of each other, save or paralyzed; extra save at end of each turn

Immovable Object.description: 1 obj <10 lb fixed in place; holds 4k lb; Str check move, except chosen/password; See B (25gp cons.)

Invisibility.description: 1+1 creature invisible; attacking/casting makes the creature visible; anything worn/carried also invisible

Lesser Restoration.description: 1 creature cured of 1 disease, or 1 condition: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned

Levitate.description: 1 creature/obj up to 500 lb save or rise vertically, up to 20 ft; 1 a (move a if self) move up/down 20 ft

Locate Animal/Plants (R).description: Learn direction and distance to closest named or described kind of beast or plant within 5 miles

Locate Object.description: Learn direction to closest named or described kind or specific object within 1000 ft; see book

Magic Mouth (R).description: Implant a 25 word message in an object that is uttered on chosen trigger condition (10gp cons.)

Magic Weapon.description: 1 nonmagical weapon becomes magical with +1 bonus to attack and damage; SL4: +2, SL6: +3

Max's Earthen Grasp.description: Medium hand attacks 1 creature: save or 2d6 Bludg. dmg & restrained; 1 a hand moves/attacks, releases; see B

Melf's Acid Arrow.description: Spell attack for 4d4+1d4 Acid dmg and 2d4+1d4 next turn; on miss half dmg, no next turn

Mind Spike.description: 1 creature 3d8+1d8 Psychic dmg, know its location, can't be invis for me; save half, no other benefits

Mirror Image.description: Create three illusionary duplicates of me; destroyed if hit; randomize attacks; AC 10 + my Dex mod

Misty Step.description: I teleport 30 feet to a unoccupied space I can see

Moonbeam.description: 5-ft rad 40-ft high all enter/start turn 2d10+1d10 Radiant dmg; save half; 1 a move it 60 ft; see B

Nystul's Magic Aura.description: Create a false magic item with chosen properties or shroud a magical item from detection

Pass Without Trace.description: Any within 30-ft rad +10 Dex(Stealth) checks, leave no tracks, can't be tracked by nonmagical means

Phantasmal Force.description: 1 creature save or sees 10 ft cube illusion that does 1d6 Psychic dmg/rnd; Int(Investigation) vs. spell DC

Prayer of Healing.description: 6 living creatures heal 2d81d8spellcasting ability modifier HP

Protection from Poison.description: 1 creature cured from 1 poison, gains resistance to Poison damage, and adv. on saves vs. being poisoned

Pyrotechnics.description: 5 cu ft nonma. flame extinguish, or 10-ft rad all creature save or blind 1 rnd, or 20-ft rad hvy obsc. 1 min

Ray of Enfeeblement.description: Spell attack; creature does half dmg with weapon attacks that use Str; save at end of each turn to end

Scorching Ray.description: 3+1 rays hit creature(s) on spell attack with each ray for 2d6 Fire dmg per ray

See Invisibility.description: See invisible/ethereal creatures and objects as if they were visible; ethereals are ghostly, translucent

Shadow Blade.description: Sword 2d8 Psychic dmg, finesse, light, thrown (20/60 ft), adv. if target in dim/dark; +1d8 at SL3/5/7

Shatter.description: 10-ft rad all 3d8+1d8 Thunder dmg; save halves; nonmagical unattended objects also take dmg

Silence (R).description: 20-ft rad no sound propagates; all within deafened, immune to Thunder dmg, can't use verbal comp.

Skywrite (R).description: Write up to 10 words with clouds in a part of the sky I can see; strong wind can diperse the clouds

Snilloc's Snowball Swarm.description: 5-ft radius all creatures 3d6+1d6 Cold damage; save halves

Spider Climb.description: 1 gains climbing speed equal to walking speed; can go on walls and ceilings with hands free

Spike Growth.description: 20-ft rad difficult terrain; all 2d4 Piercing dmg per 5 ft moved; Wis(Perc) vs. Spell DC to recognize

Spiritual Weapon.description: Create weapon; spell attack 1d81d8/2SLability modifier Force dmg; bonus action to move 20 ft and/or attack

Suggestion.description: 1 creature save or follow understood reasonable stated course of action; ends if I or allies harm target

Summon Beast.description: Summon choice of Bestial Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; disappears at 0 hp (200gp)

Tasha's Mind Whip.description: 1+1 creature, max 30 ft apart; 3d6 Psychic dmg; no rea; only move, act, or bns; save half, no act limit

Warding Bond.description: 1 creature +1 AC, +1 saves, resistance all dmg; if takes dmg I take same dmg; ends if >60 ft away (100gp)

Warding Wind.description: Strong (20 mph) wind around me deafens/extinguishes unprotected flames/dif. ter./ranged weapon dis.

Web.description: 20-ft cube, anchored, all save or restrained; dif. ter.; lightly obscures; Str check vs. Spell DC to free

Wristpocket (R).description: Store 1 held obj <5 lb in extradim. space; 1 a to summon obj in free hand or return; reappears at end

Zone of Truth.description: 15-ft rad all in or enter save or unable to lie; I'm aware if saved or not; creature aware it cannot lie

Animate Dead.description: Turn corpses into 1+2 Skeletons or Zombies; control for 24h; bonus action command within 60 ft

Aura of Vitality.description: As a bonus action for the duration, I can heal 2d6 HP to 1 creature in range (can be me)

Beacon of Hope.description: Any creature in range adv. on Wis/Death saves and gains max HP from any healing

Bestow Curse.description: 1 creature save or cursed, see book; duration SL4:conc, 10 min; SL5:8h; SL7:24h; SL9:until dispelled

Blinding Smite.description: Next melee weapon hit +3d8 Radiant dmg; save or blinded; extra save at end of every turn

Blink.description: 50% chance every turn to travel to Ethereal Plane and return to an empty space within 10 ft next turn

Call Lightning.description: 60-ft rad 10-ft high cloud; 1 a all in 5-ft rad under cloud 3d10+1d10 Lightning dmg; save half

Catnap.description: 3+1 willing creature unconscious for 10 min to gain benefits of short rest; Ends if dmg or 1 a to wake

Clairvoyance.description: See or hear a familiar place; 1 a to switch between seeing and hearing (100gp)

Conjure Animals.description: Summon 2+2/2SL CR of beasts; obey my verbal commands

Conjure Barrage.description: Throw weapon or ammo; copies rain down for 3d8 dmg; dmg type as weapon; save halves

Counterspell.description: Stop a spell being cast; if above SL of this spell, make DC 10+SL spellcasting ability check

Create Food and Water.description: Create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water; enough for 15 humanoids or 5 steeds for 24h

Crusader's Mantle.description: Me and allies in range deal extra 1d4 Radiant dmg with weapon attacks

Daylight.description: 60-ft rad bright light + 60-ft dim light on point or object; only magical darkness of SL 4+ works in it

Dispel Magic.description: Dispel all magical effects on creature or object; if above this SL, DC 10+SL spellcasting ability check

Elemental Weapon.description: +1 magical weapon; +1d4 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder dmg; SL5: 2/2d4, SL7: 3/3d4

Enemies Abound.description: 1 creature save or regard all creatures it can see as enemies, random targeting; save when damaged to end

Erupting Earth.description: 20-ft cube all creature 3d12+1d12 Bludgeoning dmg; save halves; area becomes difficult terrain

Feign Death (R).description: Willing creature appears dead; it is blinded, incapacitated, has dmg resist. all but Psychic, and speed 0

Fireball.description: 20-ft rad all creature 8d6+1d6 Fire dmg; save halves; unattended flammable objects ignite

Fly.description: 1+1 willing creatures gain fly 60 ft speed

Gaseous Form.description: 1 willing creature into a misty cloud with fly 10 ft, resist. to nonmagical dmg, adv. on Str/Dex/saves

Glyph of Warding.description: Create a glyph that triggers on set condition; Int(Investigation) vs. Spell DC; see book (200gp cons.)

Haste.description: 1 willing creature +2 AC, speed doubled, adv. on Dex saves, extra action (1 attack, dash, disengage, hide)

Hunger of Hadar.description: 20-ft rad all: blind while in, start turn in 2d6 Cold dmg, end turn in save or 2d6 Acid dmg

Hypnotic Pattern.description: 30-ft cube all creature save or charmed, incapacitated, speed 0 for duration; ends if creature takes dmg

Intellect Fortress.description: 1+1 creature, each max 30 ft apart, has Psychic damage resistance and adv. on Int, Wis, and Cha saves

Leomund's Tiny Hut (R).description: 10-ft rad immobile dome of force holds 9 Medium creature; blocks magic; ends if I leave; see book

Life Transference.description: I take 4d8+1d8 Necrotic dmg (in full) and 1 creature in range I can see heals twice that in HP

Lightning Arrow.description: Next rngd weapon attack 4d81d8 Lightn. dmg, miss half; 10 ft all 2d8+1d8 Lightn. dmg, save half

Lightning Bolt.description: 100-ft long 5-ft wide all 8d6+1d6 Lightn. dmg; save halves; unattended flammable obj ignite

Magic Circle.description: Celes., elem., fey, fiends, or undead can't enter/leave; dis. on attack; +1h dura.; see B (100gp cons.)

Major Image.description: 20-ft cube illusion includes visible, audible, olfactory, temperature; 1 a move it; SL6: no conc.; see B

Mass Healing Word.description: 6 living creatures heal 1d41d4spellcasting ability modifier HP

Meld into Stone (R).description: I merge into a stone object large enough to contain me; can't see through the stone; see book

Melf's Minute Meteors.description: 6+2 meteors; at casting/bonus action send up to two 120 ft for 5-ft rad all creature 2d6 Fire dmg; save half

Nondetection.description: 1 creature or object up to 10 cu ft hidden from all divination magic (25gp cons.)

Phantom Steed (R).description: Summon quasi-real steed with 100 ft speed (10 mph); I designate rider; spells ends if it takes dmg

Plant Growth.description: 1 a: 100-ft rad plants overgrow for 1/4 speed; 8h: 1 mile diameter plants yield double food at harvest

Protection from Energy.description: 1 creature gains resistance to either Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage for duration

Pulse Wave.description: 6d6+1d6 Force dmg, pulled/pushed 15+5 ft from me (also free obj); save halves, no move

Remove Curse.description: 1 creature or object is freed of all curses; cursed magic items break attunement with owner

Revivify.description: Restores a creature's body that has died in the last min to life with 1 HP (300gp cons.)

Sending.description: Send a 25 word message to a familiar creature; it recognizes me and can respond with 25 words

Sleet Storm.description: 40-ft rad 20-ft high; heavily obsc.; douses flames; difficult ter.; save or prone; Con save or lose conc.

Slow.description: 6 creature in 40-ft cube save or half spd, -2 AC, -2 Dex saves, no rea, only 1 a or bonus action, 1 attack; see book

Speak with Dead.description: 1 corpse with mouth answers 5 questions with what it knew in life; can cast on same every 10 days

Speak with Plants.description: Speak with plants in range about last 24h events; turn difficult plant terrain to normal or vice versa

Spirit Guardians.description: Undesignated creature start turn/enter in area half speed, 3d8+1d8 Radiant/Necrotic dmg; save half

Spirit Shroud.description: My attacks 1d81d8/2SL Cold/Necro/Radiant dmg, no heal until next turn; any creature I see -10 ft spd

Stinking Cloud.description: 20-ft rad; ignores cover, heavily obscures; all in area at start of turn save against poison or can't act

Summon Fey.description: Summon choice of Fey Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; disappears at 0 hp (300gp)

Summon Lesser Demons.description: Summon up to 8 (16 at SL6, 24 at SL8) CR ≤1 1 demons, DM choice; attack nearest non-demons

Summon Shadowspawn.description: Summon choice of Shadow Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; disappears at 0 hp (300gp)

Summon Undead.description: Summon choice of Undead Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; disappears at 0 hp (300gp)

Thunder Step.description: Me + 1 willing creature teleport 90 ft; all creature in 10 ft of origin 3d10+1d10 Thunder dmg; save half

Tidal Wave.description: 30-ft x 10-ft, 10-ft high all creature 4d8 Bludg. dmg and prone; save halves not prone; extinguish flames

Tiny Servant.description: Animate 1+2 Tiny, nonmagical, unattended obj as tiny servants; bonus action to command telepathically

Tongues.description: 1 creature understands all spoken languages, all with a language can understand what it means

Vampiric Touch.description: Spell attack each turn as 1 a for 3d6+1d6 Necrotic dmg; I heal half the damage dealt

Wall of Sand.description: 30×10×10ft (l×w×h) wall on the ground; blocks line of sight; blinded while inside; 1/3 move

Wall of Water.description: 30×1×10ft (l×w×h) or 20-ft rad 20-ft high; dif. ter.; range weapon dis.; Fire dmg half; Cold dmg freezes

Water Breathing (R).description: 10 willing creatures can breathe underwater for the duration

Water Walk (R).description: 10 willing creatures can move across any liquid for the duration; rise to surface if underwater

Wind Wall.description: 50×1×15ft (l×w×h) wall, any line-shape, at cast all in 3d8 Bludg. dmg; save halves; blocks arrows

Arcane Eye.description: Create invisible, moving (unlimited range, 30 ft/rnd) 1" magic eye with darkvision I see through

Aura of Life.description: Me + any creature while in area Necrotic dmg resist.; at turn start, 0 HP living in area heal 1 HP

Aura of Purity.description: Me + any creature while in area Poison dmg resist., immune to disease, adv. on saves vs. conditions

Banishment.description: 1+1 creature save or banished; creature return if spell lasts < 1 min

Blight.description: 1 creature takes 8d8+1d8 Necrotic dmg; save halves; plants have dis. on save

Charm Monster.description: 1+1 creatures, each max 30 ft apart, save or charmed; adv. on save if me/ally is fighting it

Compulsion.description: Any creature that hear me save or I can, as bns, have it move fully in one direction; save again after move

Confusion.description: 10+5-ft rad all save or confused, see book; extra save at end of every turn

Conj. Minor Elementals.description: Summon 2+2/2SL CR of elementals; obey my verbal commands

Conj. Woodland Beings.description: Summon 2+2/2SL CR of fey; obey my verbal commands

Control Water.description: Control an amount of water in a 100 ft cube as 1 a; flood, part, redirect, or whirlpool, see book

Death Ward.description: Once, when creature drops to 0 HP it drops to 1 HP instead; or negates first instantaneous kill effect

Dimension Door.description: Teleport myself and 1 willing creature within 5 ft, up to 500 ft to a place I can see, specify, or describe

Dominate Beast.description: 1 beast save or charmed, follows telepathic commands, 1 a for complete control; +SL for duration

Elemental Bane.description: 1+1 creature, each max 30 ft apart, save or 1 energy: lose resist. to it & +2d6 to first dmg with it/turn

Evard's Black Tentacles.description: All that enter/start 20-ft rad save or restrained & 3d6 Bludgeoning dmg/rnd; Str/Dex check to escape

Fabricate.description: Create simple object from raw materials; or complex object if proficient in the appropriate tools

Find Greater Steed.description: Gain the services of a steed; can communicate with it telepathically; can share spells with it; see book

Fire Shield.description: Fiery shield gives either Fire or Cold dmg resist. and deals 2d8 of the other dmg type to melee attackers

Freedom of Movement.description: 1 willing creature; magic cannot reduce speed, paralyze, restrain; use 5 ft to escape nonmagical restraints

Giant Insect.description: Transform centipedes, spiders, wasps, or scorpions into giant versions; obey my verbal commands

Grasping Vine.description: Conjure vine with 30 ft reach; bonus action to direct to 1 creature save or pulled 20 ft to vine

Gravity Sinkhole.description: 20-ft rad all creature 5d10+1d10 Force dmg, pulled to center of radius; save halves and not pulled

Greater Invisibility.description: 1 creature invisible until end of the spell; anything the target is weaponring or carrying is also invisible

Guardian of Faith.description: Place spectre; hostiles coming in 10 ft of it 20 Radiant dmg; save half; vanishes after it deals 60 dmg

Guardian of Nature.description: I transform into a Primal Beast (offensive bonuses) or a Great Tree (defensive bonuses); see book

Hallucinatory Terrain.description: 150-ft cube of terrain resembles some other sort of terrain; Int (Investigation) vs. Spell DC; see book

Ice Storm.description: 20-ft rad 40-ft high all creature 2d8+1d8 Bludg. dmg & 4d6 Cold dmg; save half; 1 rnd difficult ter.

Leomund's Secret Chest.description: Hide chest with content in Ethereal Plane for 60 days, after that chance of loss; 1 a reappear (5050gp)

Locate Creature.description: Learn direction to closest named or described kind or specific creature within 1000 ft; see book

Mor. Faithful Hound.description: Invisible, immobile dog does melee spell attack for 4d8 Piercing dmg; sees invisible/ethereal; see book

Mor. Private Sanctum.description: Up to 100+100 ft cube is magically secured in chosen way; see book

Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.description: 1 creature/obj up to Large save or enclosed in impenetrable sphere; can be moved as hamsterball

Phantasmal Killer.description: 1 creature save or frightened; end of each turn save to end or 4d10+1d10 Psychic dmg

Polymorph.description: 1 creature with > 0 HP save or transformed into beast of choice of same CR or lower; see book

Shadow of Moil.description: Me: heavy obsc., Radiant resistance; 10-ft rad: 1 step darker, hit vs. me get 2d8 Necrotic dmg (150gp)

Sickening Radiance.description: 30-ft rad all enter/start turn save or 4d10 Radiant dmg, 1 level of exhaustion, and emit 5-ft rad light

Staggering Smite.description: Next melee weapon hit +4d6 Psychic dmg and save or dis. on attacks/chks, no rea, until end next turn

Stone Shape.description: Form 5 cu ft of stone into any shape; can have up to two hinges and a latch, but no finer mechanisms

Stoneskin.description: 1 willing creature resistance to nonmagical Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing dmg (100gp cons.)

Storm Sphere.description: 20-ft rad dif. ter., all now/end turn save or 2d6 Bludg. dmg; bonus action 60 ft attack 4d6 Lightn. dmg; +1d6

Summon Abberation.description: Summon choice of Abberant Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; vanishes at 0 hp (300gp)

Summon Construct.description: Summon choice of Construct Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; vanishes at 0 hp (400gp)

Summon Greater Demon.description: Summon 1 demon of CR 5+1 that obeys me; end of each of its turn, save to break free; see book

Vitriolic Sphere.description: 20-ft rad all creature 10d4+2d4 Acid dmg, +5d4 dmg next turn end; save half & no dmg next turn

Watery Sphere.description: 5-ft rad all creature < Huge save or restrained; on save ejected; save each rnd; 1 a move sphere 30 ft

Animate Objects.description: 10+2 nonmagical objects not worn or carried; bonus action command within 500 ft; see book

Antilife Shell.description: Only undead and constructs can come within 10 ft; if forced upon living creature the spell ends

Awaken.description: Give beast or plant Int 10 and ability to move. Follows commands for 30 days (1000gp cons.)

Banishing Smite.description: Next weapon hit +5d10 Force dmg; if this brings target HP<50, I banish it until spell ends

Bigby's Hand.description: Large hand attacks, pushes, grapples or shields, see book; AC 20, my max HP; bonus action move 60 ft

Circle of Power.description: Any creature while in area adv. on saves vs. magical effects; if save would half dmg it takes no dmg

Cloudkill.description: 20-ft rad 5d8+1d8 Poison dmg; save halves; move 10 ft/rnd; heavily obscured, difficult terrain

Commune (R).description: Ask up to three yes/no questions to my deity or a divine proxy (25gp)

Commune w. Nature (R).description: Know 3 facts about natural features in 3 miles rad (300 ft rad underground)

Cone of Cold.description: 8d8+1d8 Cold dmg; save halves; creature killed become frozen statues until thawed

Conjure Elemental.description: CR 5+1 elemental; obeys my verbal commands; breaks free on broken conc.

Conjure Volley.description: Turn ammo/thrown weapon into volley; 40-ft rad 20-ft high 8d8 dmg; dmg type as weapon; save halves

Contact Other Plane (R).description: I make DC 15 save to ask extraplanar entity 5 questions with one word answers; insane on fail

Contagion.description: Melee spell attack for poisoned; save each rnd, 3 success: spell ends, 3 fail: poison ends, disease; see B

Control Winds.description: 100-ft cube of air either gusts, downdraft, or updraft; affects flying/jump/ranged; 1 a change; see B

Creation.description: Create a nonliving object up to a 5+5-ft cube of vegetable matter, stone, metal, gems or rare metals

Danse Macabre.description: 5+2 small/medium corpses as zombie/skeleton; spellc. mod to attack/dmg; bonus action command in 60 ft

Dawn.description: 30-ft rad 40-ft high all creature 4d10 Radiant dmg at cast/end turn; bonus action move it 60 ft (100gp)

Destructive Wave.description: Any creature 5d6 Thunder dmg & 5d6 Radiant or Necrotic dmg & knocked prone; save halves, not prone

Dispel Evil and Good.description: Cele., elem., fey, fiends, and undead dis. on attacks vs. me; end early for dismissal/break enchantment

Dominate Person.description: 1 humanoid save or charmed, follows telepathic commands, 1 a for complete control; +SL for dur.

Dream.description: Me or willing creature enters a creature's dreams, manifesting as a messenger with whom it can communicate

Enervation.description: 1 creature 4d8+1d8 Necrotic dmg, action to repeat, I heal half; on save 2d8+1d8 dmg once; see B

Far Step.description: At casting and as bonus action for duration, I can teleport 60 ft to a space I can see

Flame Strike.description: 10-ft rad 40-ft high all creature 4d6 Fire dmg and 4d6 Radiant dmg; save halves; +1d6 Fire or Radiant

Geas.description: 1 creature save or charmed, it must obey commands or 5d10 Psychic dmg; SL7: 1 year, SL9: until disp.

Greater Restoration.description: Reduce exhaustion or end charm, petrify, curse, stat or max HP reduction (100gp cons.)

Hallow.description: 30-ft rad protected against celestials, elementals, fey, fiend, and undead; add additional effects; see B

Hold Monster.description: 1+1 creature (not undead), each max 30 ft apart, save or paralyzed; extra save at end of each turn

Holy Weapon.description: Wea +2d8 Radiant dmg; bonus action end spell: 30-ft rad all creature 4d8 Radiant dmg, blind; save half, no blind

Immolation.description: 1 creature save or 8d6 Fire dmg & burns for 4d6 Fire dmg/rnd; save each rnd to end; save half, no burning

Insect Plague.description: 20-ft rad all now/enter/end turn 4d10+1d10 Piercing dmg; save half, no cover; light obsc.; dif. ter

Legend Lore.description: Learn summary of lore of named or described person, place, or object (200gp; 250gp cons.)

Maelstrom.description: 5-ft deep 30-ft rad dif. ter.; all creature starting turn in save or 6d6 Bludg. dmg and pulled 10 ft to center

Mass Cure Wounds.description: 6 living creatures within 30-ft rad heal 3d81d8spellcasting ability modifier HP

Mislead.description: I go invisible; creaturete illusionary duplicate of me, 1 a move it, bonus action switch between its senses and mine

Modify Memory.description: 1 creature save or charmed, alter 1 memory of last (SL6: 7, SL7: 30, SL8: 365) day; SL:9 any memory

Passwall.description: Create a passage (max. 5 ft wide, 8 ft tall, 20 ft deep) in a wooden, plaster or stone surface for 1 h

Planar Binding.description: 1 celestial/elem/fey/fiend save or bound; SL6: 10, SL7: 30, SL8: 180, SL9: 366 days (1000gp cons.)

Raise Dead.description: Restores a creature's body that has died in the last 10 days to life with 1 HP; see book (500gp cons.)

Rary's Telepath. Bond (R).description: 8 willing creature with Int>2 gain a telepathic bond that works for any distance on the same plane

Reincarnate.description: Brings humanoid that died in last 10 days to life in a new random adult body, see book (1000gp cons.)

Scrying.description: 1 creature save or sensor follows it around; or creaturete sensor in familiar location; see book (1000gp)

Seeming.description: Any creature save or disguised by changing physical appearance; Int(Investigation) check vs. spell DC

Skill Empowerment.description: 1 willing creature gains expertise in one skill of my choice that it is proficient with for the duration

Steel Wind Strike.description: Melee spell attack vs. 5 creature in range; 6d10 Force dmg on hit; after, I teleport next to one target

Summon Celestial.description: Summon choice of Celestial Spirit; obeys commands; takes turn after mine; disappears at 0 hp (500gp)

Swift Quiver.description: Quiver gives nonmagical ammo; bonus action to make 2 attacks with weapon that uses ammo from that quiver

Synaptic Static.description: 20-ft rad all creature Int>2 save or 8d6 Psychic dmg, -1d6 on attacks/check/conc. save; save half, no -1d6

Telekinesis.description: Move Huge creature or 1000 lb object 30 ft as 1 a; spellcasting ability check vs. Str check; see B

Teleportation Circle.description: Create a circle to teleport to another teleportation circle on same plane; see book (50gp cons.)

Temporal Shunt.description: Cast if see attack/cast, 1+1 creature, each max 30 ft apart, save or vanish until next turn, attack/cast wasted

Transmute Rock.description: 40 cu ft stone to mud or mud to stone; mud and stone restrains; mud from ceiling falls; see book

Tree Stride.description: I can teleport 1/rnd for 5 ft move through a tree to another tree of the same kind within 500 ft

Wall of Force.description: 10 10×10-ft panels or 10-ft rad (hemi)sphere invisible, impenetrable wall; can float in air; see book

Wall of Light.description: 60×5×10ft (l×w×h) 4d8+1d8 Radiant dmg & blind; save half, not blind; 1 a rngd spell attack; see B

Wall of Stone.description: 10 10×10-ft panels 6" thick wall connected with existing stone; half thickness, double surface; see B

Wrath of Nature.description: 60-ft cu dif. ter.; rock: rngd attack 3d8 Bludg. dmg; tree: Dex or 4d6 Slash. dmg; root: Str or restr.; see B
